title: Spelt Shortbread, Vegan, LowGL
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 150C/300F/Gas Mark 2 and line a 18cm/7in square tin
2. Cut the coconut oil into the flour and use your fingers to rub it together until it resembles breadcrumbs.
3. Add the xylitol to the mixture and work together to form a firm dough.
4. Press dough into baking tin and press down to even out and make flat along the top.
5. Bake in the oven for about 45mins then remove from oven and cut into pieces and decorate top with fork while still warm.
6. Allow to cool in tin and then store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: 100g/3.5oz Coconut Oil (try to get one treated so it does not have a coconut flavour, unless you want it)
